cast.name: 玛丽安娜·菲斯福尔 Marianne Faithfull
安妮塔·帕里博格 Anita Pallenberg

awards:
第76届戛纳电影节(2023)
　　金眼睛奖 最佳纪录片(提名)

director.name: 亚历克西斯·布鲁姆 Alexis Bloom

this_title: Catching Fire: The Story of Anita Pallenberg
trans_title: 星火燎原：安妮塔·帕伦伯格的故事
introduction: An exploration of the life of Anita Pallenberg, European actress and rock ’n’ roll muse. Told in Anita’s own words, from her unpublished memoir, and in the words of her family, this bittersweet film is a never-seen-before look at life with The Rolling Stones. Using Super 8mm home movies shot in the 1960s and 1970s, and contemporary interviews, the filmmakers weave together an intimate and profoundly moving story. Anita was a woman with a wild life: she dazzled the Festival de Cannes Film Festival and and inspired love in those around her, including Tilda Swinton who performed the voice over of the film.
chinese_title: 星火燎原：安妮塔·帕伦伯格的故事
foreign_title: Catching Fire: The Story of Anita Pallenberg
